pull_request.body:
### Checklist
#### General
- [x] I tested all changes locally
- [x] I followed the naming conventions

### Motivation and Context
The current login page does not show proper error messages when authentication fails, causing confusion for users who mistype their password.

### Description
This PR adds descriptive error messages to the login form. When authentication fails, users now see specific messages like "Invalid password" or "User not found" instead of a generic error.

### Steps for Testing
1. Log in as any user
2. Navigate to the login page
3. Enter an invalid password
4. Verify that the error message says "Invalid password"
5. Enter a non-existent username
6. Verify that the error message says "User not found"

### Screenshots
N/A - no visual changes, only text content
